segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, completely fixated on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost impressive how she seems unaware of the water cascading off the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the puddle forming at her feet; it almost looks like a little lake now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window makes the situation almost serene, yet chaotic at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little anxious about what could happen if she slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks peaceful and inviting, a stark contrast to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems so unfair that she's so absorbed in her task, unaware of the potential disaster around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
